mapper.insert: insert into db_functionconfiglog (SID, 'NAME', OPER, OPENFLAG, OPERTIME, OPERTYPE, 'STATUS', FUNCTIONID, CONTENT, DESCR) values (#{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{opertype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{functionid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{descr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_functionconfiglog set 'NAME' = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPENFLAG = #{openflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OPERTYPE = #{opertype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, 'STATUS' = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FUNCTIONID = #{functionid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, DESCR = #{descr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SID, 'NAME', OPER, OPENFLAG, OPERTIME, OPERTYPE, 'STATUS', FUNCTIONID, CONTENT, DESCR from db_functionconfiglog where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select SID, 'NAME', OPER, OPENFLAG, OPERTIME, OPERTYPE, 'STATUS', FUNCTIONID, CONTENT, DESCR from db_functionconfiglog
